document_data.name: The Unveiling
document_data.mainbody: The '''Unveiling''' was a horrific ceremony performed by worshipers of [[Gargauth]] every Midwinter night.
document_data.Activities: Many gruesome sacrifices occurred during this dark ceremony, heralding the looming unveiling of the "Lord Who Watches" and the "Lord of All." Gargauth's faithful believed this would occur when the Hidden Lord seized all of [[Faer√ªn]] as his unholy realms and transported it to [[Baator]] as a new layer of the Nine Hells.
